current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
Congratulating the Penn State University wrestling team for winning the 2014 National Collegiate
			 Athletic Association Wrestling Championships.

cosponsor.#tail: ) submitted the following resolution; which was considered and agreed to

text.#text:
commends the Penn State University wrestling team’s wrestlers, coaches, and staff for their
			 diligence, enthusiasm, and hard work; and

recognizes the Penn State University students, faculty, alumni, and devoted fans who supported the
			 Nittany Lions on their path to winning their fourth consecutive NCAA
			 Wrestling Championships.

Whereas Ed Ruth became the first Penn State University wrestler to win 3 NCAA individual
			 championships, and David Taylor became the sixth Penn State University
			 wrestler to win 2 NCAA individual championships; and

Whereas the Penn State University wrestling team concluded the 2013-2014 season with a record of 15
			 wins and only 1 loss, and won its fourth consecutive Big Ten Championships
			 title: Now, therefore, be it

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 SRES 409 ATS: Congratulating the Penn State University wrestling team for winning the 2014 National Collegiate Athletic Association Wrestling Championships.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}rights.#text: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
